definition: need not
(negative prefix)/not/no
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
needless to say/it goes without saying
committing all manner of crimes/completely unscrupulous
pinyin: wu2 suo3 bu4 yong4 qi2 ji2

definition: have sth ready just in case/keep sth for possible future use
you're welcome/don't mention it/no need to stand on ceremony
"keep the change" (restaurant expression)
You're welcome/Don't mention it

sentences.english: You’re probably one of those weirdos that doesn’t drink coffee in the morning either.
sentences.chinese: 而且你可能也是那种早晨不用喝咖啡的古怪人。

sentences.english: But Love does not traffic in a marketplace, nor use a huckster's scales.
sentences.chinese: 但爱不在市场上交易，也不用小贩的秤来称量。

sentences.english: Well, dearie, you don't need to ask me.
sentences.chinese: 好的，宝贝，你不用再征求我的同意。

sentences.english: “You don’t have to drop them off, ” Madeleine said, undeterred.
sentences.chinese: “你不用交给别人去洗，”玛德琳毫不退缩地说。

sentences.english: Our guests, no matter where you come from, please make yourself at home.
sentences.chinese: 不管远近都是客人，请不用客气。

sentences.english: The shovel is the one tool that Davis and his fellow principal investigators do not use.
sentences.chinese: 铲子是戴维斯和他的主要调查者弃之不用的工具。

sentences.english: Granny grudged to part with anything, including the disused.
sentences.chinese: 也许这个词已经废弃不用了吧。

sentences.english: Well, we could consider not putting in item 0.
sentences.chinese: 好了，我们不用考虑0号物品了。

sentences.english: A man, like a sword, rusts in idleness.
sentences.chinese: 刀不用会生锈，人闲着会怠惰。

sentences.english: Stir in the cream and reheat to serving temperature without boiling.
sentences.chinese: 搅拌奶油，不用煮加热到合适的温度。

sentences.english: Without no seams nor needle work.
sentences.chinese: 不用针线就用情意密密缝。

sentences.english: I will lend you all the few books that I can spare.
sentences.chinese: 我愿把我能不用的书都借给你，尽管这些书为数不多。

sentences.english: What can pierce one's ears without a hole.
sentences.chinese: 什么东西可以不用孔就可以穿过耳朵？

sentences.english: We can go there without navigation.
sentences.chinese: 俺们不用导航也能到那可以。

sentences.english: Slice like a pro without risking a cut.
sentences.chinese: 像专业人士那样切片也不用担心割伤。

sentences.english: Need not medicaments and become an operation, the good method that treats rhinitis is there?
sentences.chinese: 不用药物和做手术，有什么好的治疗鼻炎的好方法吗？

needless
don't!/must not
surname Bie
to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
to make sb change their ways, opinions etc
unexpectedly
if only/so long as
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore
anxious/worried/uneasy/to worry/to be anxious
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
to omit/to dispense with/to make unnecesary/to save (time, trouble etc)
anyway/in any case/to come over from the enemy's side
(negative prefix)/not/no
not to feel like (doing sth)/disinclined to
it doesn't matter
surname Pa
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps
can/may/possible/able to/not bad/pretty good
